doNotHaveAccountYet: Do not have an account yet?
signUpToAcceptInvite: Please sign in/up to accept the invite
clickToAcceptAs: Click the button below to accept the invite with as {{email}}
acceptInviteWithDifferentAccount: Want to accept the invite with a different account?
alreadyHaveAccountStatement: I already have an account, I want to sign in instead
doNotHaveAccountStatement: I do not have an account, I want to sign up instead
addingToOrganization: We are adding you to {{name}}. Please Wait...
passwordResetSubheading: Enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
passwordResetSuccessMessage: Check your Inbox! We emailed you a link for resetting your Password.
passwordLengthError: Please provide a password with at least 6 characters
sendLinkSuccess: We sent you a link to your email! Follow the link to sign in.
verificationCodeHint: Enter the code we sent you by SMS
sendMfaCodeError: Sorry, we couldn't send you a verification code
verifyMfaCodeError: Ops! It looks like the code is not correct
reauthenticateDescription: For security reasons, we need you to re-authenticate
errorAlertHeading: Sorry, we could not authenticate you
emailConfirmationAlertHeading: We sent you a confirmation email.
emailConfirmationAlertBody: Welcome! Please check your email and click the link to verify your account.

errors.auth/user-disabled: Your account has been disabled. Please contact Support.
errors.auth/too-many-requests: You have exceeded the number of allowed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.auth/network-request-failed: The request failed due to a network error. Please try again.
errors.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: The account already exists with a different credential
errors.auth/credential-already-in-use: This credential is already in use. Please try with another one.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already in use. Please try with another one
errors.auth/cancelled-popup-request: The request was cancelled. Please try again.
errors.auth/invalid-phone-number: Invalid phone number. Please use another format.
errors.auth/requires-recent-login: Sorry, we require you to sign-in again to perform this action
errors.auth/internal-error: Sorry, we weren't able to process your request. Please try again.
errors.auth/multi-factor-info-not-found: The user does not have a second factor matching the identifier provided.
errors.auth/invalid-verification-id: The verification ID used to create the phone auth credential is invalid.
errors.auth/invalid-multi-factor-session: The request does not contain a valid proof of first factor successful sign-in.
errors.auth/invalid-custom-token: The custom token format is incorrect. Please check the documentation.
errors.auth/code-expired: The SMS code has expired. Please re-send the verification code to try again.
errors.auth/no-auth-event: Sorry, an internal error has occurred. Please try again
errors.auth/provider-already-linked: This provider has already been linked to your account.
errors.auth/missing-email: Sorry, we haven't found an email address connected to your account
errors.auth/unsupported-first-factor: Signing in with a multi-factor account requires sign-in with a supported first factor.
errors.default: Email or Password are invalid. Please try again
errors.generic: Sorry, we weren't able to authenticate you. Please try again.
errors.link: Sorry, we encountered an error while sending your link. Please try again.
